name: Dirty Hands DVD      Free Shipping in US only!
description:
FREE SHIPPING in the US only. For international orders please email info@dirtyhandsmovie.com.

Dirty Hands chronicles the life and career of David Choe from 2000 to 2007 as documented by his close friend and director, Harry Kim. The documentary reveals the highs and lows involved in the upwards trajectory of David's career using the same "no holds barred" style that makes his artwork so unique and sought-after. Ultimately, the film unveils a explicit yet personal story of the trials of a succeeding talent, inspirational to any artist.

Originally, the "Dirty Hands" documentary premiered at the Los Angeles Film Festival to multiple sold-out screenings and went on to win the Grand Jury Prize at the San Diego Asian Film Festival. It was also featured as the closing film at the MoMA's "All the Wrong Art: Juxtapoz Magazine on Film" documentary series.
